author: Stephen Wynne
description: Stephen’s inspiration: “I am inspired to inspire others! Chapter 4 is a breakdown of my journey and legacy so far; starting at the beginning and talking about what has inspired me to get to this point, whilst also trying to help others along their own journey. It is also about being able to savour moments in time and not let what is happening right now pass you by.”
name: Chapter 4
